name: Compliance Reporting Engine
description: A Salsify microservice responsible for calculating compliance scores and turning those scores into insights. Powers the Brand Compliance Report (accessible at insights/reports/inbox?report_type=Brand+Compliance) which provides an in-app report grid artifact and an xlsx downloadable report. Also supports Syndicated Product Liveness Events. Uses Rails with Sorbet for type checking and runs on port 30012 by default.

name: Brand Compliance Report
description: An insights product in Salsify that provides compliance scoring and reporting for brands. Accessible in the application at insights/reports/inbox?report_type=Brand+Compliance. The report comprises an in-app report grid artifact and an xlsx downloadable report, generated by the Compliance Reporting Engine.

name: LMV (Syndicated Product Liveness)
description: A feature in the Compliance Reporting Engine related to Syndicated Product Liveness Events. Has its own database schema, events schema, and multi-stage processing architecture. The LMV system appears to track product liveness across syndication channels.

name: Syndicated Product Liveness Events
description: An insights product supported by the Compliance Reporting Engine that tracks product liveness status across syndication channels. Uses a multi-stage processing architecture with dedicated database and events schemas (LMV system).

name: Compliance Score
description: A calculated metric in the Compliance Reporting Engine that measures how well products meet compliance requirements. These scores are transformed into insights for the Brand Compliance Report and other reporting products.

name: Compliance Report Job
description: A Delayed::Job in the Compliance Reporting Engine (Reports::ComplianceReports::ComplianceReportJob) that generates compliance reports. Jobs are identified by organization_id and channel, and duplicate jobs for the same org/channel on the same day can be deduplicated using the ReportDedupe class.

name: Report Deduplication Tool
description: A utility class in the Compliance Reporting Engine used via Rails console to deduplicate Delayed::Jobs for ComplianceReportJob. Removes excess jobs that match on organization_id and channel, keeping only the newest report request since reports run twice on the same day have minimal changes.

name: Image Compare Tool
description: A debugging utility in the Compliance Reporting Engine for comparing images between two URLs for a specific retailer. Useful for troubleshooting image comparison mismatches that confuse customers, which can occur due to bot protection defenses when the system downloads images in mass vs. browser-based downloads.
